Mayank Kukreja

LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/mkukreja1 
 
Power BI/ Spotfire Developer 
 
PROFILE SUMMARY 
 
➢ Over 5+ Years of IT Experience in using Oracle SQL developer, Tibco Data Virtualization in IT Projects involving 
Business Intelligence (BI), in Development, Test and Production Environments in Logistic domain. 
➢ Over 4 years of experience developing interactive dashboards using Power BI and Over 5 years of experience 
working with Tibco Spotfire using 7.11, X,11.4,11.6. 
➢ Experienced in using SQL for developing Stored Procedures, Triggers, Tables, Views and User Defined Functions. 
➢ Strong Experience in Performance tuning of Spotfire and Power BI reports and in TDV as well. 
➢ Experience in working with Iron Python scripts in Spotfire. 
➢ Expertise in the usage of homogeneous Tibco Data Virtualization too involving conversion of data from

➢ Experience in working with Iron Python scripts in Spotfire. 
➢ Expertise in the usage of homogeneous Tibco Data Virtualization too involving conversion of data from 
heterogeneous data sources including Oracle SQL Developer, Excel, Rest API. 
➢Worked on all the Products in Power BI such as power BI Desktop, power BI pro, Power BI Report 
Server, Power BI Premium and Tibco Spotfire Client and Web player.  
➢ Expertise Knowledge in writing DAX Queries and MDX Queries. 
➢ Strong understanding of project life cycle and SDLC methodologies including Waterfall and Agile. 
➢ Experience in facilitating Joint Requirement Planning (JRP) sessions with Business User Groups, conducting Joint 
Application Development (JAD) sessions with IT Groups. 
➢ In depth understanding of the As-Is and To-Be (Gap Analysis) business processes and experience in converting these 
requirements into Technical Specifications for preparing Test Plans.

➢ In depth understanding of the As-Is and To-Be (Gap Analysis) business processes and experience in converting these 
requirements into Technical Specifications for preparing Test Plans. 
➢ Expertise in Tracking, Documenting, Capturing, Managing and Communicating the Requirements using Requirement 
Traceability Matrix (RTM)which helped in controlling numerous artifacts produced by the teams across the deliverables 
for a project. 
➢ Expertise in designing and creating various analytical reports and Dashboards to help users to identify critical KPIs 
and facilitate strategic planning in the organization. 
➢ Mastered the ability to design and deploy rich Graphic visualizations with Drill Down menu option and Parameterized 
using Spotfire. 
➢ Expertise in using Spotfire Filter, URL and Highlight actions to switch between sheets and navigate to external or 
internal websites

using Spotfire. 
➢ Expertise in using Spotfire Filter, URL and Highlight actions to switch between sheets and navigate to external or 
internal websites 
➢ Expert in visualizing the data, reporting and analysing, creating the dashboards and reports in an intelligible pictorial 
representing like bars, Scatter plot, pies, lines etc. 
➢ Proficient in creating Spotfire  dashboards using advance Spotfire functions like Calculated fields, Document 
Properties and etc. 
➢ Extensive experience in creating users, groups, sites, row level security and monitoring server activities in Spotfire 
and Power BI. 
➢ Worked on Power BI and created reports and dashboards and published them on service. 
➢ Experience with full development cycle including requirements gathering, design, UAT, and Deployment. 
➢ Strong interpersonal skills with demonstrable verbal and written communications to maintain effective work 
relationships with all levels of personnel.

EMPLOYMENT DETAILS 
 
Project:  Agility  Metrics  Dashboard 
 
Nov’ 20 – Till  Date 
Client:  FedEx (U.S.A) 
Involved in developing and maintaining, supporting various small and large report dashboard for client. 
 
Description: The purpose of this deliverable project is to create new Power BI report/dashboard t o an al y z e t h e  R eal  
time Agility through various charts and visualization. 
 
Responsibilities: 
 
➢Developed Rich looking Analytical Dashboards and Reports in Power BI for Business Executives to take better 
decision. 
➢Worked with DAX Functions Such as SUMX, CALCULATE, ALLEXCEPT, FILTER, RANK. 
➢Created Drilldowns, Drill throughs and Bookmarks in Power BI Reports for easy navigation and storytelling. 
➢Worked in 'M' Language and Power Query for data cleansing in Power BI desktop query editor. 
➢Created and Managed Parameters in Power BI Desktop for changing the source with different environments such as 
development, test and production.

➢Created and Managed Parameters in Power BI Desktop for changing the source with different environments such as 
development, test and production. 
➢Created Dynamic Dropdown measures in slicer with the help of DAX in Power BI Desktop. 
➢Developed Measures, Calculated Columns, Conditional Columns, Custom Columns in Power BI. 
➢Developed different types of reports such as Descriptive, Predictive, Prescriptive for end-users. 
➢Created and developed Dynamic and Static Row-Level-Security in Power BI Desktop according to the roles assigned 
to the users 
➢Created various visualizations such as Scatter Charts, Bubble chart, Slicers, Stacked Charts, Pie Charts, Donut Chart. 
Cards according to business requirements. 
➢ Installed and Configured Power BI gateway (Personal/Enterprise) to schedule daily jobs to refresh 
reports/dashboards in Power BI Service. 
➢Designed Data Models in Power Bi Designer by using schemas such as STAR, SNOWFLAKE and GALAXY.

reports/dashboards in Power BI Service. 
➢Designed Data Models in Power Bi Designer by using schemas such as STAR, SNOWFLAKE and GALAXY. 
➢Handled Relationships in Power BI desktop such as MANY-MANY, ONE-MANY, MANY-ONE, ONE-ONE. 
➢Developed and deployed reports for the internal users in Power BI Report Server. 
➢Worked with both the modes of connection in power bi such as Direct/Import Query Modes. 
 
Environment: Oracle SQL Developer/Power BI Desktop/Outlook MS Office 365 /Mobile, Power BI Premium, Rest API, 
Power BI Services. 
 
 
 
Project: Test Metrics Dashboard 
 
Feb’ 18 -Oct’20 
Client: FedEx (U.S.A) 
   Involved in developing and maintaining, supporting various small and large report dashboard for client. 
 
Description: The purpose of this deliverable project is to create new Spotfire report/dashboard to analyze the Test 
Metrics through various charts and visualization. 
 
Responsibilit ies :

➢ Gathering requirements from Client and transforming them in technical architecture and design document. 
➢ Involved in daily client calls. 
➢ Write complex SQL queries, joins, stored procedures, trigger functions, views in Tibco Data Virtualization tool. 
➢ Write Rest API code in java to fetch the data from API to develop the real time report. 
➢ Improving the performance tuning of Dashboard by using many types of caching like Incremental, 
Information links, Scheduling updates of analysis and caching model, optimizing caching in Spotfire and 
TDV respectively. 
➢ Creating Information links, parameterization, calculated columns using different property controls to facilitate 
high quality outcome. 
➢ Responsible for interaction with business stakeholders for gathering and understanding the requirement at 
initial phase and involved in migration of report from one level to another. 
➢ Developed functionality for user profile Access aka tab level security.

initial phase and involved in migration of report from one level to another. 
➢ Developed functionality for user profile Access aka tab level security. 
 
Environment:  Oracle SQL Developer, Tibco Spotfire X, LDAP API, Tibco Data Virtualization, Iron Python, SQL, Rest API.
